title: Cant find Sylas in ranked
body: I have played a few games in draft with him no problem but everytime i go into ranked i cannot find sylas anywhere when i try to find him? is this just me or is this a bug?

replies.body:
So Sylas has been released for like 3 days and you're trying to play him in ranked
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eVFd46qABi0
You have to own the champion to be able to play it in ranked.
